Setting the scene 8.1 This chapter provides an overview of Tower Hamlets, its people, economy, housing profile, indicators of deprivation, built form, environment, and town centres. It highlights how the borough is a microcosm of London, having the fastest population growth in the country and having always been a gateway for people of all backgrounds to live, work, and visit the borough.
